query:
SELECT 
  v.id as vendaId,
  v.dataVenda,
  DATE(v.dataVenda) as dataVendaFormatada,
  v.valorTotal,
  p.cvNsu,
  p.valor as valorPagamento,
  p.tipo,
  p.bandeira
FROM vendas v
INNER JOIN pagamentos p ON p.vendaId = v.id
WHERE p.cvNsu IN ('176726822', '27410510', '175329394', '26402146')
ORDER BY v.dataVenda DESC;
